            Hello!
            I’m Caro, short for Caroline!
            I’m a curious and creative human, with a passion for data of all sorts. I love wrangling unconventional data, or using a visualization to build understanding and promote data literacy.
            I have worked on a wide variety of client projects, from AI-generated graffiti and time series modeling to advanced analytics and data visualization. I thrive in environments where data, curiosity, creativity and rabbit holes are encouraged.
            In my spare time, you’ll probably find me outside: either biking fast, wandering the neighborhood or playing Spikeball.
            Feel free to give a holler!
            
            
            Education
            Seatte Pacific University | Seattle, WA
            B.S. Applied Mathematics | 2014 - 2018
            
            
            Experience
            Data Scientist | Wunderman Thompson | June 2018 - Present
            Private Math Tutor | August 2020 - Present
